languages.text: {n}Люди слишком напряжены и напуганы, чтобы их эмоции было легко прочитать. Они могут говорить правду — а могут и врать, чтобы выгородить себя.{/n}
{n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Люди слишком напряжены и напуганы, чтобы их эмоции было легко прочитать. Они могут говорить правду — а могут и врать, чтобы выгородить себя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}
{n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}
{n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}
{n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些人过于紧张、过于恐惧，你看不出来他们真正的意图。他们说的可能是实话，但也有可能是为了自保而撒谎。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些人过于紧张、过于恐惧，你看不出来他们真正的意图。他们说的可能是实话，但也有可能是为了自保而撒谎。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Están demasiado tensos y asustados como para interpretar sus intenciones con certeza. Podrían estar diciendo la verdad, pero también es posible que estén mintiendo para protegerse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Están demasiado tensos y asustados como para interpretar sus intenciones con certeza. Podrían estar diciendo la verdad, pero también es posible que estén mintiendo para protegerse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らは緊張して怯えすぎており、その意図が読み取れない。本当のことを言っている可能性もあるが、自分を守るために嘘をついている可能性もある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らは緊張して怯えすぎており、その意図が読み取れない。本当のことを言っている可能性もあるが、自分を守るために嘘をついている可能性もある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie sind zu angespannt oder verängstigt, du kannst ihre Absichten nicht deuten. Sie könnten die Wahrheit sagen, sie könnten aber auch lügen, um sich selbst zu schützen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie sind zu angespannt oder verängstigt, du kannst ihre Absichten nicht deuten. Sie könnten die Wahrheit sagen, sie könnten aber auch lügen, um sich selbst zu schützen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ces gens sont trop nerveux et effrayés pour que vous puissiez cerner clairement leurs intentions. Peut-être disent-ils la vérité, ou peut-être mentent-ils dans l'espoir d'échapper à d'éventuelles représailles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They are too tense and frightened for you to easily read their intentions. They could be telling the truth, but they could also be lying to protect themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ces gens sont trop nerveux et effrayés pour que vous puissiez cerner clairement leurs intentions. Peut-être disent-ils la vérité, ou peut-être mentent-ils dans l'espoir d'échapper à d'éventuelles représailles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gerginlikleri ve korkuları sebebiyle niyetlerini kolayca anlayamıyorsun. Kendilerini korumak adına yalan söylüyor olabilecekleri gibi gerçekleri anlatıyor olmaları da mümkün.{/n}
